description: Numbers n such that string 3,7 occurs in the base 10 representation of n but not of n+1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n],{3,7}]>0,1,0],{n,3500}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 06 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
